dict.acceptation: 科学的；有系统的；应用科学的；精通学理的，有学问的；

sent.orig: In this paper,the components and properties of TDR system (Campbell Scientific Inc.) were introduced.
sent.trans: 本文介绍了Campbell Scientific公司的TDR测试系统的组成、性能及工作原理。

sent.orig: Scientific knowledge aims at being wholly impersonal.
sent.trans: 科学知识要求完全不受个人感情的影响。

sent.orig: We should double our efforts to publicize scientific knowledge, scientific approaches, scientific thinking, and scientific spirit.
sent.trans: 加强科学知识、科学方法、科学思想、科学精神的宣传教育。

sent.orig: Scientific problem is a factor of scientific inquiry activity and impenetrate in scientific activity all along.
sent.trans: “科学问题”是科学探究活动的要素，并贯穿于探究活动的始终。

sent.orig: Medical care is regressive, it is anti-scientific, negative scientific, -scientific medical practices and methods.
sent.trans: 是倒退的医疗行为，因此是反科学、负科学、伪科学的医疗行为和方式。
